H0.text: In which city were the 1984 Summer Olympics held. New York City

H1.text: In which city were the 1984 Summer Olympics held. Chicago

H2.text: In which city were the 1984 Summer Olympics held. Boston

H3.text: In which city were the 1984 Summer Olympics held. LA

A4.text: The 1984 Summer Olympics were held in Los Angeles, California, United States.

A5.text: Los Angeles was chosen as the host city of the 1984 Summer Olympics by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) on 18 May 1978.
